EmailTemplate.name: Leads_Statusupdate_Nextstep
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Leads Status Update Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
Please refer to the following lead for which you are the assigned owner.
Lead has been qualified by you and next status update is due now since 30 days have elapsed. You are requested to revisit the lead and follow the Aerospace Convert Process for earliest realization of revenue.
Please update all necessary fields, including the “Next Steps” section, accordingly.
Access your lead from the summary information below:
Lead: {!Lead.Link} Company: {!Lead.Company} Name: {!Lead.Name} Product Information: {!ATR_Product_Information__c} Lead Description: {!Lead.Lead_Description__c}
Thank you for your cooperation.
Please refer below for Lead Status Definitions:
Sales Accepted: A lead formally accepted by sales upon which sales agrees to take action.
Sales Qualified: A lead that has evolved into a qualified pipeline opportunity. These leads should be converted to Opportunities.
Recycle: Leads that need to be passed back to marketing because they were not ready to buy, but the lead needs to remain active.
Disqualified: Leads that are not appropriate or viable such as a no or incorrect contact info, not our target market, lead is from a student or job seeker, customer contact established and customer is not interested, Opportunity already exists. “Reason for disqualification” field on leads page is to be populated accordingly.
